Thank you for your message and for clarifying your question.

At the moment, we are not able to extend an offer. While the place may appear unfilled publicly, we are still in the process of prioritizing and reviewing families according to our admissions priority order and pending conversations/decisions.

Regarding a waitlist/reconsideration process: we do keep details on file for reconsideration if the place remains open after higher-priority options are exhausted. You do not need to re-submit the same application repeatedly—your prior materials and stated willingness to confirm quickly are noted. If anything changes and we are able to make an offer, we will contact you directly.

Sincerely,
Nursery_E Admissions

Dear Parent_E,

Thank you for your continued patience.

To confirm: we are still awaiting final outcomes/confirmations from families ahead of you in our admissions priority order, so we are not yet able to extend an offer further down the list at this time.

Regarding the single fastest next step if/when we are able to issue an offer to your family: please be ready to reply to our offer email with a clear written acceptance ("We accept the Nursery_E offer") the same day. Once we receive that acceptance, we will immediately send the enrollment packet and payment instructions (deposit link) and, if needed, propose a short call/visit time.

Your written confirmation remains on file, and there is nothing additional you need to do right now. If our status changes and we reach your position, we will contact you directly.

Sincerely,
